This page presents a collection of data visualizations I've created, mostly for fun/in my free time. All visualizations were created using the R programming language.

### #TidyTuesday Visuals

[#TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/README.md) is a weekly data analysis and visualization project run by the [R4DS Online Learning Community] intended to provide R users with opportunities to refine their skills. The visuals below are my contributions #TidyTuesday. Code for all visuals is in my [Github](https://github.com/ekholme/TidyTuesday).

<br/>
